alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Calhoun and central Roane Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spencer, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Arnoldsburg, Amma, Left Hand, Orma, Looneyville, Tariff, Chloe and Gandeeville. This includes Interstate 79 between mile markers 25 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
